channel.title: Torrent program making things slow
channel.description:
Hey there wasn't sure where to post this so i guess "questions" shall be good for it.
I'm pretty sure what i have isn't what is supposed to happen. What i'm talking about is when ever i open Utorrent any other program that uses the internet will not respond, e.g. firefox, msn, internet explorer...
I think this is a bug and/or fault because i'm pretty sure other people have utorrent open and are able to run everything fine. I've used Bittorrent before and i think the same happened with it (Although that was more than a while ago).
So anybody have any idea how to fix this?
Does the same happen to you?
Or am i just going to have to live with it and leave my internet all night long.
Oh also i'd like to say that the other program stop responding even when im not downloading/uploading anything at all, so don't think its because im downloading something at 1000kb/s. :)
Thanks.

item.title: Torrent program making things slow
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Buzzy:

its the bandwith. you only have so much at a time.

No, even if he is NOT dowloading, the programs FREEZE, not his bandwidth on them, the whole bloody program.

Read full topic

item.title: Torrent program making things slow
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

its the bandwith. you only have so much at a time.

Read full topic

item.title: Torrent program making things slow
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

leader:

The other applications that require internet run slow because your torrent application is using most of your internet bandwidth. So most likely, you won’t load pages quickly when your using your torrent application.

l2 read
joke, thanks for helping but i did say that even when im not downloading anything (E.g. its using 0kbps bandwidth) it still doesnt let me use any other programs.

Read full topic

item.title: Torrent program making things slow
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

The other applications that require internet run slow because your torrent application is using most of your internet bandwidth. So most likely, you won’t load pages quickly when your using your torrent application.

item.title: Torrent program making things slow
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

I have the same problem, it wasn’t always like this but the RIAA put something into the torrenting programs and that’s why they’re becoming slow imo. When I torrented, I couldn’t use any other program that used internet.

Read full topic

I’m a member of demonoid but havent checked there forums so i will now.
and ca1lum i had the problem when i had bit torrent also.

item.description:
@llib wrote:

I suggest you register at a torrent website forums and ask there? Like demonoid, they have pretty helpful forums, then ask your queston there, what better place to post a torrent queston then on a torrent website?

item.description:

Have you checked there FAQ on the website or do you have vista that may be it i have had it before and worked fine…if you cant fix it try Bit Torrent again
